document_data.name: ''Ring of Multiple Wishes''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of multiple wishes''''' was a wondrous [[magic item]] that granted ''[[wish]]es''.
document_data.Powers: A ''ring of multiple wishes'' held 2â€“8 ''wish'' [[spell]]s which could be used to make the wearer's wildest dreams come true.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Shal Desanea]], a [[wizard]] from [[Cormyr]], wore a ''ring of multiple wishes''.
